top source boundaries::init

result = boundaries::init(region=region, inputarr=inputarr [, scan_width=integer], sundiam=sundiam [, sigmavalue=integer] [, time=time])

Loads a triple-sun image and crops out selected regions one-by-one.

Keywords

region
inputarr
scan_width in optional type=integer default=5

How far apart the scanning should be.

sundiam
sigmavalue in optional type=integer default=1

Sets the threshold to be:

max(image) - sigmavalue*stddev(image)

time in optional

Print the elapsed time

Examples

cropped = boundaries(region=1,inputarr=image,sundiam=sundiam,scan_width=scan_width,$ thresh=thresh)

top source boundaries::cleanup

boundaries::cleanup

top source boundaries__define

boundaries__define

top source cropit::init

result = cropit::init(region=region [, scan_width=integer], sundiam=sundiam [, sigmavalue=integer] [, time=time])

Loads a triple-sun image and crops out selected regions one-by-one.

Keywords

region
scan_width in optional type=integer default=5

How far apart the scanning should be.

sundiam
sigmavalue in optional type=integer default=1

Sets the threshold to be:

max(image) - sigmavalue*stddev(image)

time in optional

Print the elapsed time

Examples

cropped = cropit(region=1,inputarr=image,sundiam=sundiam,scan_width=scan_width,$ thresh=thresh)

cropit::cleanup

top source centerit::init

result = centerit::init( [file=string] [, time=time] [, sigmavalue=integer], region=integer)

Had to make a new version of comp3 because the old one called scanbox() by default

Keywords

file in optional type=string

What file to load in

time in optional

Print the elapsed time

sigmavalue in optional type=integer default=2

Sets the threshold to be:

max(image) - sigmavalue*stddev(image)

region in required type=integer default=1

Which sun out of the three to find the center of. Defaults to the brightest sun

top source centerit::cleanup

centerit::cleanup

top source centerit__define

centerit__define

top source getstruct::init

result = getstruct::init( [scan_width= integer] [, file= string] [, sigmavalue= integer] [, time=time])

Finds the centers of a triple-sun image and loads all relevant information including offsets and angles into a new structure.

Keywords

scan_width in optional type= integer default= 5

How apart the scans are for minicrop(). Overrides defaults in tribox().

file in optional type= string default= 'triplesun.bmp'

What file to find 4 centers for

sigmavalue in optional type= integer default= 2

Sets the threshold to be:

max(image) - sigmavalue*stddev(image)

time in optional

Outputs how much time the program takes

top source nutricenter

nutricenter [, scan_width= integer] [, file= string] [, sigmavalue= integer] [, time=time]

Finds the centers of a triple-sun image and loads all relevant information including offsets and angles into a new structure.

Keywords

scan_width in optional type= integer default= 5

How apart the scans are for minicrop(). Overrides defaults in tribox().

file in optional type= string default= 'triplesun.bmp'

What file to find 4 centers for

sigmavalue in optional type= integer default= 2

Sets the threshold to be:

max(image) - sigmavalue*stddev(image)

time in optional

Outputs how much time the program takes
